column4: Hi, sorry could not find answer for this.  Can I load from windows installer, multi instance of ubuntu... ie 11.10 and 12.04?
i dont think wubi can handle differnt installs of ubuntu on the windows side at teh same time
thanks, for answer.  So should I partition from my 11.10 instance and load 12.04 fresh?
i never use wubi and i dont reccomend it.. I always do clean installs.
